item.title: Geph 5-Year Celebration
item.description:
ğŸ‰ Geph as a production service is turning 5 on December 4, 2024! To begin celebrations, we are doing an unprecedented ğŸ Plus discount & giveaway:

- ğŸ—“ November 14-20: At a secret time during the next week, we will release a 25% off promo code in the Geph Telegram group. This discount will apply to the first 500 users to use it!

- ğŸ† November 20: we'll randomly pick 1 lucky winner out of the 100 most active users in our Telegram group over the past week. This person will receive a 5-year Plus giftcard!

ğŸš€ Join the Telegram Geph community and jump into discussions to win!
